Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell has become one of the most promising power generation methods today due to its diverse fuel sources, high efficiency, easy maintenance, and environmental friendliness.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the exhaust gas temperature of the solid oxide fuel cell is still too high, and its direct emissions will cause a large amount of energy loss.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: To further improve the efficiency of the SOFC/GT system, a novel cascade waste heat recovery system is designed where the top cycle is the Brayton supercritical carbon dioxide cycle and the bottom cycle is the organic Rankine cycle.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In order to better evaluate the performance of the system, this paper first carried out thermodynamic analysis of the subsystem respectively, and obtained the exergy flow process of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Then, an economic model is established for the entire system and calculated the annual total cost rate.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results are: the system efficiency can reach 73.97%, and the corresponding total cost rate of system operation is 36.25 $/MWh, reflecting excellent performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic and economic analysis of a novel cascade waste heat recovery system for solid oxide fuel cell
